item.title: Duffers Golf Team Interviewed
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mix)
item.dc:creator: Mix
item.content:encoded: Be sure to jump on over the first interview with the Duffers Team at Unrealtournament2004.co.uk, where we give some background and insight on Duffers Golf.

item.title: Course Creation Tutorial
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mix)
item.dc:creator: Mix
item.content:encoded: We've posted a simple tutorial to assist aspiring course designers in creating courses for Duffers Golf. For additional help, or to comment and ask questions, please use these forums.

item.title: Official Coil Duffers Golf Server
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mix)
item.dc:creator: Mix
item.content:encoded:
The official Coil Duffers Golf Multiplayer Alpha server is up and running at this address:

68.79.187.110

If you don't see it in the Internet Browser, open the console (~ key) and type: 'open 68.79.187.110' (without quotes).

We'll be monitring this server during normal work hours. (9-5 EST)

item.title: Duffers Golf Multiplayer Alpha Released!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mix)
item.dc:creator: Mix
item.content:encoded:
Coil is proud to announce the availability of the latest version of Duffers Golf: The Multiplayer Alpha. The mod is available via BeyondUnreal FileWorks:

UMOD Version
Zip Version

This version adds preliminary multiplayer play, as well as improving the overall game. New features include:

  • ...

Duffers Golf Multiplayer Alpha Released!

item.title: It's coming...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mix)
item.dc:creator: Mix
item.content:encoded: I know we promised a release, but you'll have to forgive us, as we're running on vapors. We'll be packaging up both zip and umod formats and releasing early this afternoon Eastern time.

item.title: Duffers Golf Single Player Beta Released!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mix)
item.dc:creator: Mix
item.content:encoded:
Coil is proud to announce the availability of the debut release of
Duffers Golf to the public. This one course single-player demo features
traditional golf utilizing Epic Games' Unreal Tournament 2004, with
totally new, totally custom physics, and a unique look unlike any other
UT2004 mod. Duffers Golf will be a entrant in the 3rd Phase of the Make
Something Unreal Contest, and the beta's purpose is to gather feedback
from the community to help Coil improve and strengthen the mod....

Duffers Golf Single Player Beta Released!

item.title: Duffers Closed Beta Released
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mix)
item.dc:creator: Mix
item.content:encoded: The Duffers Golf Team has released a closed beta to a few select people. If you would like to be considered for inclusion, send a mail and tell why you would be a good candidate. You must own a copy of UT2003.

item.title: New screenshots!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mix)
item.dc:creator: Mix
item.content:encoded: I finally posted screenshots of the latest revision of the course. Check them out at the site.

item.title: Help Wanted
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mix)
item.dc:creator: Mix
item.content:encoded:
Are you looking for a fun, different mod to work on? If your creative soul yearns for something unique and challenging, coil wants to talk to you. We're looking for a few people to help us make Duffers Golf not only a top UT2003 modification, but also the top multiplayer golf experience. Right now we're looking to fill the following positions:

  • Concept Artist: We need a talented artist to help bring our characters to life. If you're fast with a pencil and play well with...

Help Wanted

item.title: Duffers Golf Website Launches!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mix)
item.dc:creator: Mix
item.content:encoded:
coil is proud to announce the unveiling of the website devoted to our latest project, Duffers Golf. A new modification for Unreal Tournament 2003 by Epic Games, Duffers Golf features the following:

* Play a round by yourself or with up to 32 people in groups of four over the Internet
* Intuitive Interface: Aim and Swing with only a Mouse
* "Fore!" â€“ All players share the same course
* Leaderboard scoring shows the top players on the server
* Choose your character...

Duffers Golf Website Launches!
